name: Monsi
description:
Welcome to Monsi!

You and your research team have been planning a research experiment on Monsi Isle for months, due to the mountain at it's center. At the last moment however, things go awry, and you come on down to the island to help pick up the pieces. Help the scientists restore their power and observation equipment, and save the day!

Controls

WASD (or Arrows) - Move

X - Interact

E (or Z) - Inventory

C - Start Game

~Made for the LowRezJam 2021~

Thanks for Playing!
